root.name: Rocket Ranger
root.description: One of the first superhero games. It draws its inspiration from movies like TheÂ Rocketeer. The game is interesting for it's movie approach with lots of cut-scenes. Although the story refers to aliens from the Moon who have invaded the Earth in the far-off future year of 1996, the enemies were clearly intended to be Nazis, with red banners draped over their installations, distinctive metal helmets on their soldiers, and leaders hiding in aerial Zeppelin bases. Created by Cinemaware.
